title: Long Live Phoenixes
description: "Long Live Phoenixes" is Jasmine's third poetry collection. With the collection divided up into 9 laws (mantras), "Long Live Phoenixes" is a heavy reminder to never cease growing on the road of self discovery.“Ashes of pain, trauma and fear aren’t burial grounds for phoenixes—they are birthplaces.” - NJ Scribe
author: Jasmine Farrell
